1. Measure out 50 g of Si, 30 g of Tb, 70 g of Ti, 60 g of W, and 40 g of Zr using a precise balance.

3. Use a mechanical mixer or mortar and pestle to thoroughly blend the powders for 20 minutes to ensure uniform distribution.
